titleInfo.title: Armistice Day celebration in Cleveland, Tennessee

subject.topic: Patriotism; Patriotic Holiday; Military holiday; Holiday; Soldiers; Uniformed Troops; American Troops; Courthouse.

subject.geographic: Post-World War I; Post-World War One; November 11; November 11, 1920; Nov. 11; Nov. 11, 1920.

subject.topic: Chambers, T. E. P., Dr.; Knox, Harvie, Mrs.; Sullivan, Pledger.

mods.note: Seven pictures taken on the celebration of Armistice Day in Cleveland, Tennessee. The photographs include shots of the bandstand, street parades, and named individuals including Dr. T.E.P. Chambers, Pledger Sullivan (saluting), and Mrs. Harvie Knox.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
